Key Match Events: Frankie Montas walked France to lead off the bottom of the 6th
Rosario homered with one on to tie the game at 4

Doug Gray mentioned recent roster moves involving David Buchanan and Evan Kravetz

There were calls for Manager David Bell to be fired due to poor performance
